name: Happy Wars
summary: Happy Wars is the first free-to-play multiplayer online Xbox Live Arcade game for the Xbox 360.It was developed by Toylogic. The game was released on October 12, 2012 as a free download for Xbox Live Gold members through the Xbox Live Marketplace. An Xbox One version was released on April 24, 2015.
